no_permission: You do not have permission to use this command. You must be an Administrator or have one of the allowed roles: {roles}.
invalid_channel: Invalid channel. Please mention a valid voice channel.
invalid_roles: Invalid roles. Please mention valid roles.
setup_success: Setup complete! AFK channel set to {channel} and language set to {language}.
no_configuration: No AFK configuration found for this server.
language_auto_set: Language automatically set to {language} based on server settings.
error_voice_state_update: An error occurred while handling the voice state update.
bot_move_permission_missing: The bot lacks the 'Move Members' permission in the AFK channel.
permission_denied_footer: Contact an admin if you believe this is an error.
available_languages_footer: Use /setlang followed by one of the languages above to set the bot language.
invalid_language: Invalid language provided. Please refer to the available options below.
